class.name: ScormAPI
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Is a wrapper class around the Scorm API adaptor and it's related function. Do not instance directly it is available globally in TrackingManager.api
class.property: The Scorm API adaptor as provided by the LMS
The maximum number of tries to make while searching for the Scorm API adaptor
A date object holding the date/time the API was initialized
The score required to pass the course
The minimum score the user can receive
The minimum score the user can receive

event.name: error
event.description: Fires when a Scorm API error has occured. Check the console window for the error message
